serviceNotice.title: Important Service Update
serviceNotice.message: Our AI Services will soon be unavailable. Due to enhanced security measures implemented by Cursor and Windsurf platforms, account creation and trial reset operations are now problematic. Purchases for this system have been discontinued, and we thank everyone who has used it. Students can obtain a 1-year free PRO membership via https://cursor.com/students.

howCreditsWork.title: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.description: Credits are used to purchase accounts or other features. They are one-time payments and do not renew automatically.

tooManyAccounts.title: Too many free trial accounts
tooManyAccounts.error: Error: Too many free trial accounts used on this machine.
tooManyAccounts.solution: Solution: You have been detected for using multiple Cursor trial accounts on the same device. To solve this, simply use the "Reset Cursor Trial" button on the main page. This will automatically reset your machine ID and allow you to continue using Cursor without any terminal commands.

serversOverloaded.title: Our servers are currently overloaded
serversOverloaded.error: Error: Our servers are currently overloaded for non-pro users, and you've used your free quota.
serversOverloaded.solution: Solution: This error may appear when your account limit is reached. If you still have quota but see this, Cursor servers may be temporarily restricted for trial accounts. Wait a while or try logging out and back in.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Request
unauthorized.solution: Solution: The account you are using is unauthorized or blocked by Cursor.

highLoad.title: High Load
highLoad.error: Error: We're experiencing high demand for Claude 3.7 Sonnet right now.
highLoad.solution: Solution: Cursor has temporarily restricted Claude models for trial accounts due to high demand. Please wait and try again.

trialLimit.title: Trial Request Limit
trialLimit.error: Error: You've reached your trial request limit.
trialLimit.solution: Solution: Your trial account limit is reached. You can continue by obtaining a new account.

blocked.title: Your request has been blocked as our system
blocked.error: Error: Your request has been blocked as our system has detected suspicious activity from your account/ip address.
blocked.solution: Solution: If your account has been previously banned by Cursor, your IP address may be blacklisted. Change your internet IP or use the "Warp" tool: https://one.one.one.one/

connectionFailed.title: Connection Failed
connectionFailed.error: Error: If the problem persists, please check your internet connection or VPN, or email us at hi@cursor.sh.
connectionFailed.solution: Solution: Check your internet connection and make sure you're not using a VPN that might be blocked.

whatThisToolDoes.question: What does this tool do?
whatThisToolDoes.answer:
AI-powered IDEs like Cursor and Windsurf that help us code have limited use in the free plan. You can use this tool to overcome this limitation.

After getting an account, you can switch to the account by clicking on the account you received. This way, you can use multiple accounts.

howToUse.question: How do I use this tool?
howToUse.answer:
You can start by adding credits to your account to acquire accounts. The information for the accounts you purchase will be displayed on your home page. You can access additional features specific to each account type from the details tab of these accounts, such as checking limits or automatically opening the account. However, some features may require a browser extension.

You can use the accounts immediately after purchasing them.

As your account limits are exhausted, you can continue by purchasing new accounts. However, for Cursor accounts specifically, it's advisable to use the Cursor Trial Reset button on the home page before using them to avoid encountering any warnings. It's better to purchase accounts as needed rather than all at once, as accounts can sometimes be banned by providers.
